reviews.review_msg: Very disappointed in Annette's quality of instruction. She does not like like to teach  - revealing she "was doing her time" as a requirement. Wow Annette - really - your terrible attitude goes against everything Hussey & Kehler stand for! Definitely a waste of MY time. Shame on you.

Annette does not enjoying teaching (She told us this was a mandatory step for her to get her PHD). Picks Favourites. Judges her students. Will not help you get a better mark even when you ask and put in the time - just assumes you should know how to write exactly like her. Hussey  & Kehler are a better investment of your time & money.

Great professor - most likely my favourite of all profs I've had at SFU.  Awesome seminar prof - really really helpful when creating/researching papers and is really interested in the subject matter (early modern romance lit). Highly recommended!
